name: Bubbles UI Library v1.0.3
description:
Hello!

This is my first public project.


Here you will find many different components of the mobile application that I am currently developing.


I hope you enjoy it very much and you learn something new for yourself.


I would be grateful for feedback if you can advise me something.


Versions 1.0.2 and 1.0.3 will be one major update to the design system, which will have elements that simplify communication between speakers of different languages


What's new?


1) The main emphasis is on the development of all scenarios of interaction with voice messages.

2) The main elements of interaction with voice messages are drawn (playback and voice message bubble)

3) There is a new function for recognizing and converting 

voice messages to text

4)  You can translate a message and a recognized 

voice message without leaving the app
